incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 09/02/2026 05:00 UTC End time : 09/02/2026 16:00 UTC List of concerned racks: - Rack RBX1003C01A - Rack RBX1003C03B - Rack RBX1003E02B - Rack RBX1003D04C Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.
